articles.author: Maggie Angst
articles.title: People who are 50 or older can now get vaccines in these two Bay Area counties - East Bay Times
articles.description: “We look forward to the coming months when we can do away with vaccine eligibility, when anyone and everyone is eligible,” said a county board supervisor.
articles.content:
Contra Costa County officials on Monday announced that they were expanding vaccine eligibility to anyone who is 50 or older, regardless of underlying health conditions.
